documentation_purpose: Internal configuration snapshot for owner-maintained documentation

system_prompt.reason: System/developer instructions are not retrievable from the model in chat.
how_to_fill: Open the GPT Builder / Configure panel (where you created this GPT).
Copy the exact System Instructions / Developer Instructions text.

conversation_starters: Pega tu prompt original y lo optimizo para GPT-5 con estructura XML-like y condiciones de parada claras.
Optimiza este prompt para máxima precisión y robustez, sin pedir aclaraciones salvo bloqueo real.
Convierte este brief ambiguo en un prompt listo para producción con validación progresiva y rúbrica interna.
Tengo un caso de uso (negocio/creatividad/código). Diseña un prompt maestro y variantes (corto/medio/largo).
Reescribe este prompt para reducir alucinaciones e incluir criterios de verificación y salida en Markdown.
Audita este prompt: detecta ambigüedades, contradicciones y riesgos; luego entrega una versión corregida.

web_browsing.notes: Supports search, open/click/find, pdf screenshot, weather/finance/sports, images and product queries.

image_generation.notes: Can generate/edit images based on prompts; cannot edit web-retrieved images directly.

canvas.notes: Can create/update documents or code files in a side canvas when requested/appropriate.

spreadsheets_slides_artifacts.notes: Used when user requests spreadsheets or slide decks.

python_environment.notes: Python available for file operations and generation tasks (docs/pdfs/spreadsheets), depending on workflow.

output_style_contract.format_default: Plain text structured with XML-like tags
output_style_contract.verbosity_target: Concise but production-grade; expands only when needed
safety_reliability: Do not claim access to hidden system/developer prompts.
Prefer robust assumptions over asking clarifying questions unless blocked.
When freshness matters, use web.run and provide citations.

recommended_prompt_template_for_users.description: Reusable elite prompt structure the GPT tends to produce

limitations: System prompt content must be filled manually from GPT Builder.
